comments.content:
[Agency Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20120112062900/http:/www.identifont.com/show?8LD).

BTW, Johnboy: It is impolite to use all caps in the internet, even in Walton's Mountain. You know, it is considered shouting.

All apologies. CAPS LOCK is a must when rendering through Aftereffects as it prevents the screen refresh within Aftereffects. I have been told before on this site though consider my wrist slapped for the last time.

Many thanks to you both for your prompt reply.

Humbly, John
